Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]Spawn Bias: None.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain 1 [ICON_Policy] Wild Card Policy slot during a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age; can use [ICON_Policy] Dark Age Policies during [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards all levels of [ICON_Buildings] Walls.
